name: Attack of the Gempire: Crystalis Seige
name_original: Attack of the Gempire: Crystalis Seige
description:
This game is an Asteroid-style shooter, where you have to protect your Cocoon from the evil elemental crystals. It's a short 5 wave battle, where you click to select enemy colours in-order to destroy them.

This game was my friends and I's first jam, and it was super enjoyable! When attempting to use the Colours theme, we decided to use it as a game mechanic to help make it more interesting. We had several ideas but decided on a shooter game, and Attack of the Gempire: Crystalis Seige was born, using simple animations and a clean pixel-art style.

Team
